text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason where concept is-a _SchedulingActReason

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _SchedulingActReasonSchedulingActReasonReasons for cancelling or rescheduling an Appointment

name: SchedulingActReason
title: SchedulingActReason
description: Reasons for cancelling or rescheduling an Appointment
